short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SmartPage is a chrome extension built to make it easier to traverse pages in textbooks and other pdfs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SmartPage is a chrome extension built to make it easier to traverse pages in textbooks and other pdfs.
Often it can be annoying to try to get to a specific textbook page because the first page of the pdf often isnt the first page of the textbook.

With SmartPage, a user can input the first page where the textbook starts numbering pages and then choose any page to go to and be taken there.
